website_summaries.verdict: One of the best options to add a true sound upgrade to your vehicle at a good price.
pros: The rectangular profile of the case makes it easy to install the speaker in a number of different locations such as underneath a driver or passenger seat
Designed to handle up to 1200 watts of power for maximum low-end sound production
cons: Large case construction takes up more interior space than individual speaker options

customer_reviews.title: FAKE pioneer
customer_reviews.text: this is not a real pioneer speaker, be careful I've bought lots of pioneer subs this one lasted like a month I had my my 1000 watt amp 2 channel turned up half way out even pushing the sub and out of no where its starts popping again I wasn't even pushing it and the volume was not up pulled kt apart and it's a phone speaker
customer_reviews.author: pjhauver

customer_reviews.title: Impressive deep bass and great sound quality in a pickup
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this sub along with this ampand this wire kit. I already had installed this stereo a few years back I added polyfill as one other reviewer mentioned and I'm really happy with this purchase. Its been years since I had a subwoofer in a vehicle and finally decided to go w/ something shallow mount and a decent amp. I'm very impressed with the output from just a 10 in such a small box. It's underneath passenger side rear seat in 2006 F150 FX4 SCREW. It was a little tight on the hump side in the middle, but it fits and sounds great.
customer_reviews.author: DIY DadTop Contributor: Fishing

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound
customer_reviews.text: This has been in my GMC Sierra now for about 4 months, it sounds great and it wasn't too expensive. It easily fits into the vehicle inconspicuously. I'll be buying another one for my Miata.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised.
customer_reviews.text: I had a couple people tell me this subwoofer wouldn’t last and it was only for trucks. However, I put it in the trunk of my car and it is much bassier than I expected and sound quite nice. I do not run it super hard but it punches quite hard for its size. It’s perfect for my car and personal taste. However, if you like extremely loud/bassy bass this may not be enough for you. I have not had any problems with it whatsoever. I would highly recommend this for anyone who wants to add a subwoofer to their system but doesn’t want to annoy others.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I paired this with the recommended amp. For the low price it works!!! And it fits great in my 2007 Corvette C6 ZO6.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus Deerwester

customer_reviews.title: Failed in 4 month and support is no help.
customer_reviews.text: Horrible quality!! Only lasted 4 months before it started failing. Called their support and they were no help. Wanted me to flip the bill, $20-$30, to ship to them on a $100 sub. Stay away from this one; go with another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Art

customer_reviews.title: Can’t go wrong with this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been working with car audio since 1996. I have 2 of these running on an Alpine PDX V-9 in my hybrid fusion. I’m pretty happy they pair nice with my pioneer head unit and custom MadaSound speaker setup. Bought a new E300 so need to find a new use for these. Maybe the racing simulator! If you want really crazy bass from a small space go to the new JL Audios or Audio Frog. Maybe something like that but for the space and price it’s so worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony P.

customer_reviews.title: Packs a punch.
customer_reviews.text: It packs a nice punch! I added this to a '13 Nissan Sentra with a factory system, and wow! For nice clean and tight bass, this subwoofer is more than I expected from such a compacted low profile box.
customer_reviews.author: K and J.

customer_reviews.title: Lifelong (40 years) Pioneer fan
customer_reviews.text: No longer. Have bought 4 of these within the last two years. One froze up tight after a year, one after one month. Called support and they require me to ship to Chicago to "diagnose". Cheaper to replace. Two words, Rockford Fosgate. On another note, 2 of 4, pioneer mono amps have shot craps in the same time period. Shorts in the gain knob. All work terrific, when they worked. Ya get what ya pay for!
customer_reviews.author: M. Wood

customer_reviews.title: Caught on fire (almost)
customer_reviews.text: Had this sub/box combo in my 17 f150 crew cab behind the rear seat in the stock sub location. I had to trim some sound deadening material to fit it there and it worked well for the application. Sound quality was pretty good with the low pass crossover on ky pioneer AVH-2300 tuned just right. Sounded great until it caught on fire. Pictures are of the motor windings protruding through the permenant magnet center hole. The windings burnt pretty hot and apparently unwound inside the speaker box my truck filled with a burning wire smell when I lost all bass, stopped to check my amp and wiring...all was well. I guess the speaker windings became hot and shorted.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful box terrible clone
customer_reviews.text: Why the box is really nice seems the box is worth more than the sub as the sub does appear fake as was posted by another review
customer_reviews.author: Skuibreaker

customer_reviews.title: It is a clean hard hitting sub
customer_reviews.text: For what it is it does REALLY well. If you want clean hard hitting bass this is prefect. This isn't 2 12 inch kickers, if you really want glass shaking bass look for those. But this 10in properly tuned and paired with speakers hits better and cleaner than a set of 12s.
customer_reviews.author: Wyatt

customer_reviews.title: 2000 Mustang GT Converible + PIONEER 10 inch = Happy Customer!:)
customer_reviews.text: 2000 Mustang GT Convertible. AMP (BOSS R1100M) remote turn on wired into aftermarket head unit. Mach 460 system untouched. This is the perfect extra BOOM my vert needed. Highly recommended. Perfect DIY project to save some hard earned $$$.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Small but enough bass!
customer_reviews.text: I was unsure of purchasing the 10 inch because I thought it wouldn't be loud enough. I was wrong! Good clear bass. I can't hear it from the outside of my truck very much but I can feel the base when I am inside, which is what I wanted. I put this under the back seat of a 2016 F150 SuperCrew. I ended up buying another.
customer_reviews.author: Emmanuel M.

customer_reviews.title: Ideal for small vehicle with limited space.
customer_reviews.text: Great for limited space. Doesn't even compare to a regular box, but when you drive a small car with limited space, this is great. I am using a 600 watt amp to push this woofer. I would say when I have a regular box in the car it produce about twice as much bass if not more. That'll give you an idea of how much bass this box produces.
customer_reviews.author: Tom T.

customer_reviews.title: Great little sub
customer_reviews.text: Great little sub, I'm getting older and don't really car to rattle my windows off. So this sub fits my taste perfectly. Gives me the low end my SUV was missing. Don't get me wrong though it does put out a decent amount of thump. Takes up very little space and if you mount the amp with some quick connects on it. Then it's all easily removable.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny B

customer_reviews.title: If you hear any rattling or humming from subwoofer return the speaker right away.
customer_reviews.text: This speaker worked but it made a humming or a rattle sound when I hooked up the subwoofer. I thought it just needed some time to break in but it wasn’t the case. The speaker stopped working. I contacted Amazon customer about the issue I had and that I sent a email to the 3rd party about the issue and didn’t hear back from 3rd party seller. Amazon did a amazing job resolving my issue and refunding my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Michael F.

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great, but doesn't fit F150 super crew
customer_reviews.text: It's a great sounding sub. I got it to fit behind the rear seats in my F150 super crew but it's too deep and doesn't fit. I have it on the floor under the seat until I come up with a skinnier box. the sub sounds fantastic and the box is well built.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Honestly its ok not the best.. I love the box design... if you want to add just a small bit of bass it's ok.. I was looking for something I can turn up a little and not have it sound bad and distorted.. I will prob purchase a different sub and reuse the box Make sure you really take the time to tune you amp and stereo to get a d decent sound Update since I have properly tunned it and broke it in this little subs kick for as small as it
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: 10” Pioneer Shallow Mount Sub
customer_reviews.text: Considering the size, it’s a good sub. Adds a surprising amount of bass to my truck. After you adjust the amplifier and head unit settings it really comes alive. Update: 2 years later it’s held up great with daily use. I’m very satisfied with this purchase and would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Joeydrumplayer

customer_reviews.title: Fits and it thumps!
customer_reviews.text: Not really a fan of 10" subs (12" subs is where its at) but nothing short of an extremely customize box will fit behind the back seat of my 2018 F250 screw. I was able to squeeze this enclosure in along with a Kenwood KAC-5001PS and hook everything up to the stock headset/nav with a LOC tapped in. Now the truck has a respectable about of thump to enjoy a variety of music. Stoked!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sub for a wonderful price!!
customer_reviews.text: Great sub for a great price. I installed this sub in my 06 single cab Silverado and it fit perfectly behind my bench seat. The sound is beautiful and it fills my cab up with wonderful bass. Loud enough for me to enjoy but quiet enough on the outside of my truck to stay under the radar to other motorists. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Adam T.

customer_reviews.title: Extremely happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: Extremely happy with this product. Just the right amount of bass for my Jeep Wrangler. Fits perfectly behind my back seat of the 2-door Jeep Wrangler .
customer_reviews.author: Ernesto N.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice bass
customer_reviews.text: Very nice sub! Fits well in 2015-2017 F-150 supercrew. Have it hooked up to Rockford fosgate 300w amp. It will rattle your insides but nice tight bass. When delivered, the box looked like it had been trampled on but the product inside had no damage.
customer_reviews.author: L. Thurmond

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the short money and sounds surprisingly well
customer_reviews.text: Bought this with the boss amp bundle and it hits very well. The bass is deeper and hits harder at a lower volume but when you turn the radio up it clears up and sounds really good. I was extremely surprised at how well it hits. The last system in my car was 2 alpine type R subs with a 3000watt ma audio amp. These dont hot that obnoxiously but it's plenty to curve your appetite for bass and awesome for just throwing in your trunk and not worrying about puncturing the sub with the platform it's on
customer_reviews.author: chris allen

customer_reviews.title: This thang thumps!!
customer_reviews.text: Tried the 8” version but opted for this one instead. Boy was it worth it. This thang THUMPS! And it is a super space saver, love the design. No more nagging wife now that we have a useable trunk again! Get it!!
customer_reviews.author: Deal Guy

customer_reviews.title: Great Value and Quality
customer_reviews.text: Paired with a 1500w planet audio mono block amp. Installed in a 2015 ford focus hatchback. Great sound, not overwhelming but loud and crisp, yet to hear distortion at any volume with gain below half. Perfect for the price and exactly what i wanted.
customer_reviews.author: not telling my name

customer_reviews.title: Great bass on my 2015 Wrangler JKU
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something small and compact in my Wrangler and was hoping that this box would fit under my rear seats but it's slightly too big. I paired it with the Boss 1100 watt amp and this combo surpassed my expectations. A very loud and clean bass, but not overwhelmingly obnoxious to everyone outside. extremely happy with this setup
customer_reviews.author: Patty Tee

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I haven't installed one of these and my 2005 f250 using a audio tech 1000w amp let me tell you what this 10-inch speaker hits hard. I love it so much I'm thinking about adding another one and upgrading my amp to 2000w and using my 1000 for front/rear Pyle I got also from Amazon that have amazing clarity sound for the price
customer_reviews.author: Michael Taylor

customer_reviews.title: If you're like me and you just like a well rounded
customer_reviews.text: if you're a "thumper" than this speaker isn't for you. If you're like me and you just like a well rounded, full sound, this will take care of your needs.
customer_reviews.author: John Clark

customer_reviews.title: Fits 14 Tundra double cab with ease
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased. I didn't need a ton of bass. Just something to round the sound out. This is perfect! I have a 2014 Tundra double cab and honestly I could have fit the 12" version under the seat. But the 10" sounds very nice
customer_reviews.author: Edward S.

customer_reviews.title: I am EXTREMELY HAPPY with this purchase. The pint size with a strong and clear punch. Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: My headline says it pretty clearly. I purchased this box for my 2006 Chevrolet, I had it installed with a 5-channel Amp and new pioneer speakers throughout the doors and the box (speaker facing down) sits nice and flat in the back without interfering with the 3rd row seats and does not take up space... I am purchasing one of these for my BMW 535Xi.
customer_reviews.author: Lumecca

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality sound
customer_reviews.text: Speaker doesn't sound that good. It rattles too much. Tried to return, no luck.

customer_reviews.title: Great Sub
customer_reviews.text: I have this in my 1996 Ford F-150 xlt extended cab in front of my back passenger seat. This sub sounds great and fits well in my truck. For a 10” sub it’s surprisingly powerful. I would recommend this sub to anyone who is looking for something that is not so pricey and still get what you want out of a sub.
customer_reviews.author: Cole Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: You can’t even hear this dang thing. Just spend the money and get a real setup.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob H.

customer_reviews.title: Big sound for little space.
customer_reviews.text: Have a 2005 3.0i Z4, replaced the entire sound system but still had no balls on the low end. Big problem, very little space. If I installed a 10" sub box, then I would have to give up the little space I have. Solution...Pioneer TSSWX2502 Shallow Mount. This sub gives me all the lows I need and I give up little space. Good crisp hits that are solid for rock and edm plus great sub-sonic low end vibes for trap and drum & bass. Installed a Rockford amp to power her..  The Rockford is maxed out and the Pioneer begs for more! Much more!! Impressive.
customer_reviews.author: Wolly09

customer_reviews.title: Great sound.
customer_reviews.text: I'm highly impressed with the quality of the sound of this sub. I got these to fit underneath the back seat of my 2004 Ford F150. For price you definitely cant beat the sound.
customer_reviews.author: Gemini

customer_reviews.title: Great space saver item.
customer_reviews.text: Deep bass but not sure if I needed a bigger speaker. Would have loved it to be louder
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Great Sub for the Price!
customer_reviews.text: Great sub, takes time to break then has much better sound range. Mounts do not come with self tapping screws, so can be difficult to secure. Very good sub for a truck or small vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Cullen

customer_reviews.title: I wanted good clean sound in my little Ford Ranger and that ...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted good clean sound in my little Ford Ranger and that is exactly what this delivers. I did not want neighbor annoying, ground shaking bass. Very solid build. Get the mix right and you will love this and the sound it generates. It is not short on bass either.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Wilson

customer_reviews.title: NOT MUCH BASS AT ALL
customer_reviews.text: Installed subwoofer in a JEEP CHEROKEE powered by a rockford 500 amp gain set to 3, could hardly tell it was on and it was rite behind driver seat, so I cut the gain up to 5, I am not kidding when I say my kicker 6x9's are almost as punchy as this 10 inch pioneer subwoofer..save your time and money on returning this junk 15$ to return it...
customer_reviews.author: Kirk

customer_reviews.title: Very good value
customer_reviews.text: For the price this combo is awesome. I have a supercrew Ford and I put 2 of these subs under the rear seat. I have them feeding off of a JBL GTR-1001 and they exceed expectations. Very slim profile and sturdy box material. I did add poly material inside of the box to help with sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Hubbard

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what i needed
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great! Just enough bass for what i listen to. Not overpowering but has enough.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Selch

customer_reviews.title: Great sub - it really pounds and is great in ...
customer_reviews.text: Great sub - it really pounds and is great in an S10. The feet on the front of the box allow it to be mounted firing downwards, so you can put stuff on top of it without worrying about it buzzing or damaging the speaker. It also fits under a jump seat in the extended cab, so you don't lose any functionality. Overall, I am very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Brown

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bump too hard
customer_reviews.text: Had for about 3 months on a pioneer 900watt amp. Really sounded nice until it gave up, didn’t work one opened trunk and full of smoke.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Pioneer subs rule
customer_reviews.text: Came undamaged and looking beautiful. Its my 2nd pioneer subwoofer in my 2nd car so im not worried about what it will sound like. I am just blown away by how shallow it id and the moderate weight! Very convenient package
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Sub works great and definately hits hard
customer_reviews.text: Sub works great and definately hits hard. I am running with a single channel 500W amp and only am running the gain at 50%. Sounds clean and performs well. The enclosure is also pretty compact so it would work in numerous applications. Bought it for a boat but will prob end up getting a second one for my truck as it will fit nicely under the back seat.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Speaks

customer_reviews.title: Made all the difference. Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This speaker has a great sound and gives plenty of that extra bass to make the music come to life.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Jordan

customer_reviews.title: GREAT sound in a very compact box
customer_reviews.text: GREAT sound in a very compact box. Fits easily under the smaller side of my 60/40 split bench of a 2014 F150. Powered is with a BOSS Audio R1100M Riot 1100 Watt an it can produce more than enough bass. On really hard hitting songs, it not perfect. I think this is due to the sealed box but on 95% of music it is fantastic. I have tried a few and I am very satisfied with this box!
customer_reviews.author: TRYALS

customer_reviews.title: Not 12 but a great 10
customer_reviews.text: For the price and size this is an incredible subwoofer. I tested it with a signal generator and it starts to fall off around 40 or 45 Hertz. It is booming hard above 60 hertz. I spent some time with a decibel meter and signal generator and was able to adjust the equalizer to get the response curve acceptable linear and flat. The Boss Audio 1200 watt amp recommended by Amazon works well with it. Fits perfectly under the rear seat of a 2001 Ford F 150 supercab with room to mount the amp under the seat next to it.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Alan

customer_reviews.title: Smooth bass
customer_reviews.text: Smooth tight bass in my 2011 Tundra Crew cab, very small space behind seats
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Fits nicely under the rear seat of my '07 Tundra DC
customer_reviews.text: Fits nicely under the rear seat of my '07 Tundra DC. Gives the sound system a nice bit of low end to round out the sound for an inexpensive price.
customer_reviews.author: BlueCrushSC16

customer_reviews.title: Sounded great while they worked but doesn't seem to last
customer_reviews.text: We bought 2 of these subs a little over a year ago both have quit working after the first year. Sounded great while they worked but doesn't seem to last.
customer_reviews.author: Verlon Rackard

customer_reviews.title: Lots more bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with this subwoofer. Bass is crisp and clear, only running 180W at 4 ohms and it beats much harder than I expected. Will be upgrading the amp soon to get closer to the 300W rms is looking for. Only thing I should have done is get the 12 inch version as my van is a little big for this sub, still though sounds great.
customer_reviews.author: WayHighPainterGuy

customer_reviews.title: Great sound!
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised! This thing sounds great. I was not expecting too much considering the size but I was wrong. Big sound from something small. Fits well in my truck.
customer_reviews.author: Nodo45

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great, it won’t rattle the windows but enough bass.
customer_reviews.author: Larry J. Moya

customer_reviews.title: Hits Hard and looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Great subwoofer for the price. Well made. Sounds amazing and it hits hard!
customer_reviews.author: M&M&M

customer_reviews.title: Good speaker good box
customer_reviews.text: This is great for a sealed box makes classic rock jazz blue country sound great not so much for most rap
customer_reviews.author: Justin Harkleroad

customer_reviews.title: Enough for my needs
customer_reviews.text: Great little sub. Sound is a little less tight than I expected with a .35 sealed enclosure....but after making numerous adjustments to crossover, gain...etc. was able to get a nice sound from kick drum. Would definitely recommend this combo.
customer_reviews.author: Jim S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This sounds awesome!!! I highly suggest this. Does not take up much room and the sound is unbelievable.
customer_reviews.author: drrllcolon

customer_reviews.title: Weak, had a hard time determining if the stereo ...
customer_reviews.text: Weak, had a hard time determining if the stereo was any louder than just the factory 6x9s. Does not play low at all..
customer_reviews.author: adam p nalow

customer_reviews.title: Gave my Mach 460 system in my 2001 mustang a new lease on life
customer_reviews.text: I paired this sub with a BOSS AUDIO R2000M Riot 2000-Watt Monoblock, Class A/B 2 to 8 Ohm Stable Monoblock Amplifier with Remote Subwoofer Level Control and installed it the trunk of my 2001 Mustang Cobra with the Mach 460 and now I enjoy plenty of hard hitting bass! An excellent upgrade!
customer_reviews.author: Bull_Winkle

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: For the price it is a great buy. Sound is good for small spaces.
customer_reviews.author: AH

customer_reviews.title: Bump, bump, bump...
customer_reviews.text: Niiiiiiiicccceee...Great sound from such a compact size and at an incredible price...
customer_reviews.author: Joe Mancilla

customer_reviews.title: Died after one month
customer_reviews.text: After just over one month of use, this unit no longer produces any audio. I checked all connections and the amplifier as well.
customer_reviews.author: Alec M.

customer_reviews.title: This product rocks
customer_reviews.text: Granted in haven’t installed it yet. I am pleased with the size and the quality of the subwoofer. I have a Scion tC and the small hatch can be easily taken up by subs. This is small enough and hopefully packs a punch. Great purchase and looks really good.
customer_reviews.author: Auntais Faulkner

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect with a powerful bass
customer_reviews.text: Fit with some slight modifications to the back storage area on my 2006 Toyota tacoma double cab. Had to cut into the plastic trays in the back. Works perfect with a powerful bass.
customer_reviews.author: Rawrooster71

customer_reviews.title: Good low profile and quality sound
customer_reviews.text: Good range of bass and matches well with a balanced system. Only running around 400w rms through it and it hits well. Have it in my fiesta st and it doesn't compromise hatch space.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great compact subwoofer
customer_reviews.text: Great if you have a small compact car and dont want to lose all your trunk space or back seat space. I have mine behind the front passengers seat. Very loud bass. I would recommend buying two for a better distributed bass inside the car. Definitely worth it for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Hector Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Maybe for small cars...
customer_reviews.text: this speaker may work for small vehicles but not mini-vans (if you want to feel the bass)...
customer_reviews.author: son of Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Trash Seller - unhelpful
customer_reviews.text: Bought a subwoofer from this seller that stopped working after less than a month of use. Had professional instillation done and all. They can’t even bother to have a real person try to find out the issue or try to resolve it. All you get is an automated email saying they won’t help you.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great for music
customer_reviews.text: Compact, lightweight, yet reasonably loud and very musical. Just right for me, mostly a jazz and classic rock listener. For hip hop, no. But for me and other old fogies, yes.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Livingston

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Fit very nice in my son's Mini Cooper. Should have bought one for my truck.
customer_reviews.author: jsna1998

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last long even with 75 watt amplifier. Tiny magnet on sub.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't last long. Blew it up in a few short months using a 75 watt Pioneer amplifier, won't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Duby

customer_reviews.title: Was ok for 30 mins it lasted
customer_reviews.text: Speaker only lasted about 30 mins before it was fried. Idk how to measure the watts accurately but my amp is rated lower that the sub. 1000 watts 500 rms is what my amp is at. Only had the gains turn half way.
customer_reviews.author: Dion

customer_reviews.title: Good sub
customer_reviews.text: Good sub for the money. Sounds great, and fin under the seat of a 2004 gmc sierra crew cab.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Pioneer 10 inch shallow mount sub-woofer
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a subwoofer to fit in a truck don't hesitate on this one, it's great! It sound very clear. I used a Boss Audio Riot Monoblock 1100 watt amp to push it and its doing great!
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: Seriously
customer_reviews.text: It was great for the first 3 days then the speaker got super hot and blew out.
customer_reviews.author: Toby Dudeck

customer_reviews.title: boom on a budget
customer_reviews.text: very impressed with the sound quality out of this small package
customer_reviews.author: Monteg0

customer_reviews.title: Good price point for this speaker
customer_reviews.text: Good price point for this speaker, great price point if you compare the speaker and the enclosure separately. Originally I wanted the 2ohm 12, but it seems that that unit is difficult to get a-hold of. This unit takes up a little bit more space behind the passenger seat than I wanted, but I was lazy and didn't want to build the box if i wasn't getting the 12" speaker I wanted in the first place. Produces pretty tight bass and functions well enough for all music types from choral to rap to country to rock as long as it is being pushed by enough power. Overall I am happy with this set.
customer_reviews.author: flatlynr

customer_reviews.title: Does a very solid job for its size. Powered ...
customer_reviews.text: Does a very solid job for its size. Powered by a very budget amp, has more than enough sound to fill the cabin of a sedan without being obnoxious.
customer_reviews.author: Mang

customer_reviews.title: Great at first but...
customer_reviews.text: Sounded awesome initially but it didn't last 2 weeks. Purchased a pioneer amp that put off less watts and didn't even have everything turned up. Blew out on me in two weeks. Knew it was too good to be true.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product sounds great. It arrived damaged. Still works great though
customer_reviews.author: Mike Ungureanu

customer_reviews.title: Great values and sound!
customer_reviews.text: I added this shallow ten to give my 3kgt a nice sound upgrade and definitely got that!! Super clean sound and love how it doesn’t take all your trunk space.
customer_reviews.author: Eddy23c

customer_reviews.title: Awesome box and speaker
customer_reviews.text: Hooked it up in my old 2001 f150 super cab with pyle gps dvd stereo and boss audio mono block amp and this one box kicks. Hits pretty hard nice and clear Time to upgrade door speakers to match
customer_reviews.author: daniel cambria

customer_reviews.title: Well built space saver and great sound
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly well built, extraordinary sound quality. Purchase this to replace a set of 2 12" subwoofers and I love it, saved a lot of space with out sacrificing sound.
customer_reviews.author: Patricio S.

customer_reviews.title: Bad purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought this sub and it blew a month later
customer_reviews.author: Raul Santacruz

customer_reviews.title: This really helped clean up the overall sound in my ...
customer_reviews.text: This really helped clean up the overall sound in my truck. The front speakers no longer have to struggle with the low frequency stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Chad A. Mitchley

customer_reviews.title: Great for limited space
customer_reviews.text: I have this under the rear seat of my 11 Tundra powered by a vintage RF amp (250 watts RMS) and can't believe how good this sounds. It doesn't hit the lows like a larger subwoofer, or shake the neighborhood, but it's small enough that I can fit another under the seat with room to spare.
customer_reviews.author: Pearce

customer_reviews.title: Great size, decent price, good sound.
customer_reviews.text: Paired with a cheap boss 1100 watt mono amp this combo fills a midsize SUV with enough bass to make you feel like your ears need to pop. Convenient size and good price point make it hard to pass up.
customer_reviews.author: Jdsu

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: tiny and saves space but also hits HARD (in a good way) love this sub better than the other loaded 10inch subs I’ve tried. Paired it with a 1500W boss Audio amp.
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value for the money! Sounds great!
customer_reviews.text: Bass range on this unit is amazing for the price tag. The bass easily fills my car and makes it shake. However, the bass doesn't overpower the highs and mids - it's quite well balanced. Buy this thing.
customer_reviews.author: SteveO

customer_reviews.title: Compact but delivers a punch
customer_reviews.text: Pros Great value,bang for your buck its hard to beat. Compact, fits nicely behind my truck seat. Cons It's a 10" so it's not going to drive the lows to rattle windows.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great for any price, excellent for this price
customer_reviews.text: Bought one. Liked it enough to buy a second. A great sounding compact sub. I have had all kinds over the years, including JL Audio (which I consider best of best). Still, for the price and size of this sub, you absolutely cannot go wrong with this pioneer sub...
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan A. Jacobi

customer_reviews.title: This thing sounds good. Like the other reviews say you won't be ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing sounds good. Like the other reviews say you won't be heard for blocks but in my jeep its sounds great.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: It bumps
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2005 Dakota that I put this in with a 1500 watt pioneer amp. Sounds great and definitely hits hard. Super easy to find a place for because it’s low profile.
customer_reviews.author: Darren

customer_reviews.title: Great sound in a small package
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product... the size is perfect if you're looking to upgrade your base by adding a small enclosure. Do not forget to use an amplifier that can provide the proper power and ohms rating required by this product or it will likely sound like garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Rivera

customer_reviews.title: It Booms
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size sub for most vehicles. Not overkill, just right. Highly adjustable bass control makes this a pleasure to pair with your car's audio.
customer_reviews.author: Annalise

customer_reviews.title: Excellent speaker and box combo!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome paired with the alpine 500w rms digital mono block amp. Hooked up to th he factory stereo in my F-250. You won't be disappointed if you hook it up right.
customer_reviews.author: Jason F.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great space saving subs. Louder than I had expected. Bought two and still tons of room in trunk.
customer_reviews.author: Mike A.

product_meta.title: Pioneer TS-SWX2502 10 inch Shallow-Mount Pre-Loaded Enclosure
product_meta.description: Pioneer TS-SWX2502 10 inch Shallow-Mount Pre-Loaded Enclosure. Music Power (Nominal): 1, 200 W (300 W) Frequency Response: 20 Hz to 200 Hz. Avoid installing in areas that are unstable or subject to frequent vibration.
feature_bullets: Music Power (Nominal): 1,200 W (400 W) Frequency Response: 20 Hz to 125 Hz, Sensitivity (1 W/1 m): 93 dB, Impedance: Single 4Ω Tight bass from a shallow compact design, Reinforced MICA injection-molded resin preloaded subwoofer cone
